author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
We test out the Scalectronics Inner Light LED controller that we first saw at the Wonderfest scale modelmaking show this year. Using a replica of a Star Trek original series computer prop, we wire up an RGB LED strip and program a simple animation based on the light sequence as seen on the show. Plus, an easy way to make use of fiber optic strands in this compact system. 

Learn more about Scalectronics' Inner Light system: https://www.scalectronics.com/
Inner Light controllers: https://www.scalectronics.com/storecontrollers.html
LED and fiber optic accessories: https://www.scalectronics.com/storergb.html

Shot and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks

Subscribe for more videos (and click the bell for notifications):  http://www.youtube.com/subscription_center?add_user=testedcom

title: Star Trek Computer Prop with Working LED Lights!
